text: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوٓا۟ إِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ

translation.en.sahih: Indeed they, when it was said to them, "There is no deity but Allah," were arrogant
translation.id.indonesian: Sesungguhnya mereka dahulu apabila dikatakan kepada mereka: "Laa ilaaha illallah" (Tiada Tuhan yang berhak disembah melainkan Allah) mereka menyombongkan diri,
